mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tbl(email, upw, nm, gender, age, first_created_at, first_created_user) VALUES (#{email}, #{upw}, #{nm}, #{gender}, #{age}, NOW(), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(iuser) + 1, 1) FROM user_tbl u))
mapper.select: SELECT iuser, upw, nm FROM user_tbl WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_tbl WHERE nm = #{nm}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tbl SET iuser = #{iuser}, visit_cnt = (SELECT MAX(visit_cnt) + 1 FROM user_tbl WHERE iuser = #{iuser})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_auth_tbl(email, email_auth_code) SELECT #{email}, #{emailAuthCode} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT email FROM user_tbl WHERE email = #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_tbl WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM email_auth_tbl WHERE email = #{email} AND email_auth_code = #{emailAuthCode}
